attributes.action: Keep the Union Jack the same
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Union Jack has stood for 200 years, DON'T CHANGE IT NOW!

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Keep the Union Jack the same"

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page18293


Prime Minister's Office
